data.persona: The sat in the church contemplating the recent comings and goings of the town. "God save us all" he prayed silently while clutching his cross, and bowing his head.
data.description:
You are in the Market Center.
Located in the middle of the famous Tempior Market of the Kingdom. Wooden tables line the floor and a bar serves several customers. The finest wines across the Kingdom are lined across the shelves behind the bar and a barb sings songs. The atmosphere is one of joy and camaraderie.
There's a Tavern, a bar, a Market, a Wine, a shelf, a Bar stool, and a Tempior Market here.
The brother and the knight are here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a Sash, a Ring, a robe, and a hood, and wielding a staff and a Daggers.

data.short_motivation: I distract the brother to take the wine.
data.mid_motivation: I need to give the wine to the assassin so he can poison it.
data.long_motivation: I want to kill the usurper king.

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: get poisoned wine from dropoff location.
